## a.timestamp() function

A timestamp scalar type that is represented by an integer value of the number of seconds before or after `1970-01-01-T00:00Z`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function timestamp(): ModelField<Nullable<number>, never, undefined, ModelFieldType.Timestamp>;
```
